metadata.name: Whiteness
metadata.description:
PHOTO

The photo was captured on the Passo Giau during a late afternoon Winter day.
The sky was all covered, the wind blowing, but there was a sense of peace in the air.
Those moments after a storm in which everything seems to calm down, the Nature breathes and the elements set.
Hope was the word that came to my mind, there's always a way to find some relief after a turbulent period.

1/1 - 7360 × 4912 

Lastoi de Formin - Italy

Yuri Santin
